origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_market_report', 'description': 'This function provides a detailed report on the latest trends in global financial markets based on the type of report and time frame requested.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial market report, e.g., global_market_analysis, sector_specific.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the report, e.g., weekly, monthly, yearly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The detailed financial market report.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_market_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'global_market_analysis', 'timeFrame'是'weekly'.
